fees.description:
Charged when a direct debit payment has dishonoured or reversed. This charge is not subject to GST.
Additional fees may apply. For more information, please visit the retailers website at energy.arcline.com.au/fees
May be charged when you move into a property or change retailer. Actual fee may vary.
May be charged when you move out and require a final meter read. Actual fee may vary.

We accept Visa and Mastercard payments via pay.energylocals.com.au. Debit card transactions are subject to a 0.46% fee, and credit card payments incur a 0.81% fee. Credit and debit card processing fees are waived for Direct Debit payments.

gasContract.terms: Arcline by RACV is provided by Energy Locals PTY LTD. For more information in relation to Arcline by RACV and this offer, see our full terms and conditions at https://energy.arcline.com.au/terms/.
gasContract.variation: Due to changes in the market and economic conditions, we may update your tariff and/or fees. We will provide at least 5 business days' notice before the change takes place.

incentives.eligibility: Receive a $50 account credit if you mention an existing Arcline customer when you join. The friend also gets $50 credit. T&Cs apply - Visit Arcline Terms and Conditions page for more information: https://energy.arcline.com.au/terms/

Receive a $100 (incl GST) bonus credited to 1st bill after transfer/connection. New residential accounts in Victoria. Further T&Cs apply, acceptance upon signup. Details at https://energy.arcline.com.au/terms/.

eligibility.information: Offer is available to Victorian residential customers with valid RACV member number in your name.

gasContract.onExpiryDescription: Open contract with no exit fees.
